flawed_nl_solution:
On Wednesday she covered half of the distance from Tuesday, so 50 / 2 = <<50/2=52>>52 kilometers.
On Thursday she rode 40 + 52 = <<40+52=92>>92 kilometers.
In total, Natalia rode 40 + 50 + 52 + 92 = <<40+50+52+92=234>>234 kilometers.
#### 234

error_details.explanation: The result of this computation should be 25, not 52. It appears two adjacent digits were swapped.
